pentago

Class MoveStringConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • pentago.MoveStringConverter

  • public class MoveStringConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for converting move and rotation string to numbers and indexes and vice versa.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MoveStringConverter()

    • Constructor Detail

      • MoveStringConverter

        public MoveStringConverter()

    • Method Detail

      • convertNextMoveToBoardNumber

        public static int[] convertNextMoveToBoardNumber(java.lang.String nextMove)
        Converts move string to block and cell number. The input string format is "B C" that 'B' part is block number in range 1 to 4 and 'C' part is cell number in range 1 to 9. Computed block and cell numbers are same integer value.
        Parameters:
        nextMove - move string
        Returns:
        an array with two members, 0 index indicates computed block number and 1 index indicates computed cell number

      • getBlockNumberFromRotationString

        public static int getBlockNumberFromRotationString(java.lang.String nextMove)
        Computes block number from input rotation string. The input string format is "B R" that 'B' part is block number in range 1 to 4 and 'R ' part is even 'c' for clockwise rotation or 'a' for anti-clockwise rotation. Computed block numbers is same integer value.
        Parameters:
        nextMove - rotation string
        Returns:
        computed block number cell number

      • getRotationFromRotationString

        public static Rotation getRotationFromRotationString(java.lang.String nextMove)
        Computes rotation from input rotation string. The input string format is "B R" that 'B' part is block number in range 1 to 4 and 'R ' part is even 'c' for clockwise rotation or 'a' for anti-clockwise rotation. Computed rotation is an object that performs rotation at desired direction.
        Parameters:
        nextMove - rotation string
        Returns:
        computed rotation object cell number

      • convertToMoveString

        public static java.lang.String convertToMoveString(int blockNum,
                                                   int cellNum)
        Converts input block and cell number to move string. The result move string format is "B R" that 'B' part is block number in range 1 to 4 and 'R ' part is even 'c' for clockwise rotation or 'a' for anti-clockwise rotation. Computed block numbers is same integer value.
        Parameters:
        blockNum - block number
        cellNum - cell number
        Returns:
        move string

      • convertToRotationString

        public static java.lang.String convertToRotationString(int blockNum,
                                                       boolean clockwise)
        Converts block number and rotation to rotation string. The result rotation string format is "B R" that 'B' part is block number in range 1 to 4 and 'R ' part is even 'c' for clockwise rotation or 'a' for anti-clockwise rotation. Computed rotation is an object that performs rotation at desired direction.
        Parameters:
        blockNum - block number
        clockwise - true if the rotation is clockwise, false otherwise
        Returns:
        rotation string
